# Generated by binpac_quickstart

project(Bro-Plugin-{{ cookiecutter.protocol_name|upper }})

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8)

if ( NOT BRO_DIST )
    message(FATAL_ERROR "BRO_DIST not set")
endif ()

set(CMAKE_MODULE_PATH ${BRO_DIST}/cmake)

include(BroPlugin)

bro_plugin_begin(Bro {{ cookiecutter.protocol_name|upper }})
bro_plugin_cc(src/Plugin.cc)
bro_plugin_cc(src/{{ cookiecutter.protocol_name|upper }}.cc)
bro_plugin_bif(src/events.bif)
bro_plugin_pac(src/{{ cookiecutter.protocol_name|lower }}.pac src/{{ cookiecutter.protocol_name|lower }}-analyzer.pac src/{{ cookiecutter.protocol_name|lower }}-protocol.pac)
bro_plugin_end()
